prompt: In the elegance of a vintage theater, a high-fashion photoshoot unfolds, enveloped in the opulent charm of classical architecture. Models clad in avant-garde designer dresses, their fabrics shimmering with intricate sequins, dominate the stage, exuding an air of regal sophistication. The rich, velvet drapes frame the scene, contrasting with the ethereal whites and silvers of the couture, creating a striking visual harmony. The photographer captures the scene from a low angle, emphasizing the towering grandeur of the models against the ornate backdrop. Subtle spotlighting from the side accentuates the details of their attire, casting dramatic shadows on the polished wooden floor and highlighting the elegant swirls of the theater's baroque embellishments. The ambient light is dusky, reminiscent of a late evening, providing a muted yet warm aura that envelops the entire setting. Golden accents in the architecture and the soft glow of vintage chandeliers infuse the atmosphere with a sense of timeless luxury. The color palette is dominated by deep claret reds, shimmering golds, and soft whites, each hue meticulously complementing the other, creating an ambiance of stately elegance and artistic flair. Signature details such as the intricate lace work on the gowns and the delicate pearls adorning the models' necks add layers of texture and refinement. Rendered in the style of classical portraiture, the photos exude an air of timeless beauty, with every detail captured in stunning clarity and precision, demonstrating a high level of professional craftsmanship.

description: Models are wearing avant-garde designer dresses with intricate sequins.
The backdrop features opulent classical theater architecture.
Velvet drapes frame the models on the theater stage.
questions: Are the models wearing avant-garde dresses?
